newsitem.title: USA: Watsco to acquire Texas-based distributor.
newsitem.headline: Watsco to acquire Texas-based distributor.

text.p: Watsco Inc said Tuesday it has signed a letter of intent to acquire Weathertrol Supply Co, a Texas-based wholesaler of residential central air conditioners and related parts and supplies.
The purchase price was not disclosed.
Watsco, which maintains distribution networks of air conditioning and heating equipment and related products, said the deal is expected to be accretive to its earnings.
It said the transaction is anticipated to close within 90 days, subject to signing of a definitive agreement and satisfaction of other conditions.
